metadata.title: Sample Portfolio | Developer
metadata.description: Portfolio for showcasing projects and skills.

description: This is where you can describe yourself. Highlight your skills, experience, and what drives you.
Include additional information about your hobbies, aspirations, or unique qualities.

projects.title: Sample Project 1
projects.description: A detailed description of the project, its purpose, and the technologies used. Keep it concise and engaging.

projects.title: Sample Project 2
projects.description: Explain the challenges faced during the project and how you solved them. Mention the skills acquired.

projects.title: Sample Project 3
projects.description: Focus on collaboration or leadership skills, if applicable, and highlight the project's impact.

contact.callToAction: Reach out for exciting collaborations or opportunities!
